definitions: Devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose.
Formally assign or set aside (something) for a particular purpose.
Devote (a book, piece of music, etc.) to a deity or to a person as a mark of honor or affection.
examples: She decided to dedicate her life to helping others.
The new building will be dedicated next month.
He dedicated his latest novel to his parents.
